full_summary:
### [Data Loggers and Sensors Tender](
{https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30712/nrcan--5000078599.pdf})

### **Tender Information**

**Title:** Data Loggers and Sensors
**Reference Number:** cb-368-75334541
**Solicitation Number:** NRCan- 5000078599
**Publication Date:** January 29, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 11, 2024, at 16:00:00 EST
**Contracting Entity:** Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)
**Contact Information:**

* Anna Weidner (anna.weidner@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
* Phone: (403) 461-9360
* Email: anna.weidner@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
* Address: 5320 122 St NW, Edmonton, Alberta, T6H 3S5, Canada

### **Description and Requirements**

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites eligible suppliers to submit proposals for the procurement of Data Loggers and Sensors. This tender is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI, who currently pre-qualify on this arrangement.

The Canadian Forestry Service (CFS) sector of NRCan has a requirement for the following equipment:

* 7 Advanced 6-port Cellular Data Loggers
* 27 Quantum PAR Sensors
* 25 TEROS 21 Gen 2 Water Potential and Temperature Sensors
* 36 TEROS 11 Sensors with 5m cable and 3.5mm stereo plug

Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document, which can be downloaded from the [Canada Buys website](
{https://canadabuys.canada.ca}).



### **Evaluation Criteria**

Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price. Qualified suppliers are required to submit a detailed bid that meets the requirements outlined in the RFP.

**Note:** This tender is closed and expired. All submittals, including quotes and offers, are considered non-binding and are used solely for the purpose of establishing the parameters for a select group of suppliers from which NRCan will select the final awardee. Only the selected supplier(s) will be contacted directly.
